snippet.title: ARK: Aberration Expansion Pack!
snippet.description:
Waking up on ‘Aberration’, a derelict, malfunctioning ARK with an elaborate underground biome system, survivors face exotic new challenges unlike anything before: extreme radioactive sunlight and environmental hazards, ziplines, wingsuits, climbing gear, cave dwellings, charge-batteries, and far more, along with a stable of extraordinary new creatures await within the mysterious depths. But beware the ‘Nameless’: unrelenting, Element-infused humanoids which have evolved into vicious light-hating monstrosities! On Aberration, survivors will uncover the ultimate secrets of the ARKs, and discover what the future holds in store for those strong and clever enough to survive!

Available October 2017!

http://store.steampowered.com/app/708770/ARK_Aberration__Expansion_Pack/

To join our growing band of survivors and download the game, join us on;

Steam on PC/Mac/Linux/SteamOS: http://store.steampowered.com/app/346110 & http://store.steampowered.com/app/512540/
Microsoft on Xbox One and soon to Play Anywhere & Xbox One X: https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/store/p/ark-survival-evolved-game-preview/bnblc4zgfnkb
Sony's PlayStation Network: https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-us/games/ark-survivor's-pack/cid=UP0691-CUSA06676_00-ARKPS4BUNDLE1001

For the latest updates follow us on:

Twitter at https://www.twitter.com/survivetheark
Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/survivetheark/
Visit the Website: http://playark.com 
Community Hub: http://www.survivetheark.com
Subreddit: www.reddit.com/r/playark
Instagram: www.instagram.com/survivetheark
Plus watch us tame and train leviathan dinosaurs: https://www.twitch.tv/survivetheark
